#include <cmath>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

int solveMeSecond(int a, int b) {
  return a+b;
}
int gcd(int a,int b)
    {
     return b?gcd(b,a%b):a;
    
     }

int main() {
  int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
        {
        
         int x1,y1,x2,y2;
         cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2;
         int p = abs(x1-x2);
        int q = abs(y1-y2);
        if(!p||!q)
            cout<<0<<endl;
        else
            {
            int r = gcd(p,q);
            p/=r;
            q/=r;
            cout<<(p+q-1)*r<<endl;
            }
        
        }
  

  return 0;
}
